title: Large Apartment on top of Nob Hill -- Pet Friendly 2br/2.5ba
posting_body: ['Apartment 7F', 'Nob Hill Tower', '1221 Jones, San Francisco, CA, 94109', 'Interested in more information?', 'See link below:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 26', 'OR Text', '26', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team.', 'Welcome to Nob Hill Tower', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath, approximately 1200 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Nob Hill Tower is an architectural gem resting on the city’s hilltops in the heart of the sophisticated Nob Hill neighborhood, offering majestic views of the San Francisco Bay and the downtown urban landscape.', 'Here, you will discover a bounty of haute cuisine, chic boutiques, and swanky lounges decorating immaculate streets.', 'Our community is bordered by charming Russian Hill and lively North Beach, where the glitz and glam nightspots and bars are lively, and the dining and shopping is fabulous and abundant.', 'Listen for the sound of nearby cable cars that can whisk you to the Financial District or Fisherman’s Wharf.', 'This is the definition of San Francisco living.', 'Features', '- Microwave', '- Refrigerator', '- Window Coverings', '- Patio/Balcony', '- Cable Ready', '- Large Closets', '- Dishwasher', '- Efficient Appliances', '- Hardwood Floors', '- View', 'Community Amenities', '- Recycling', '- On-Site Management', '- Sundeck', '- Free Weights', '- BBQ/Picnic Area', '- Sauna', '- Laundry Facilities', '- Garage (additional cost)', '- Bike Racks', '- Elevator', '- Night Patrol', '- Controlled Access/Gated', '- Clubhouse', '- Package Receiving', '- Fitness Center', '- On-Site Maintenance', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Rent: $75/month for dogs under 75 lbs; $100 for dogs over 75 lbs; $50/month for cats.', 'Pet rent covers two pets, i.e. if an applicant has two cats, we would only charge $50.', 'If an applicant has 2 different type of pets we only charge one pet rent which will always default to the greater amount.', '- Pet Deposit: There is a $500 deposit per pet.', 'This becomes part of the residents total security deposit and will not be refundable until the resident moves out.', '-There is a maximum of 2 pets allowed per apt if the building allows pets.', 'w51WhbtC', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
